slimregexp.h

00001 /*
00002  * Definitions etc. for regexp(3) routines.
00003  *
00004  * Caveat:  this is V8 regexp(3) [actually, a reimplementation thereof],
00005  * not the System V one.
00006  */
00007 #ifndef RegularexpH
00008 #define RegularexpH
00009 
00010 #define NSUBEXP  20
00011 typedef struct Regexp {
00012         char *startp[NSUBEXP];
00013         char *endp[NSUBEXP];
00014         char regstart;          /* Internal use only. */
00015         char reganch;           /* Internal use only. */
00016         char *regmust;          /* Internal use only. */
00017         int regmlen;            /* Internal use only. */
00018         char program[1];        /* Unwarranted chumminess with compiler. */
00019 } Regexp;
00020 
00021 
00022 /*
00023  * Compile a literal regular expression ("exp") into exploitable Regexp structure. 
00024  * @param exp a regular expression in text format 
00025  * @return a compiled regular expression
00026  */
00027  Regexp *regcomp(const char *exp);
00028  
00029  
00030  
00031  /*
00032   * Test the string "string" against the compiled regular expression "prog".
00033   * @param prog a regular expression
00034   * @param string the string to compare with
00035   * @return if "string" do not match the regular expression "prog" return 0, else something else.
00036   */
00037  int regexec(register const Regexp *prog, register const char *string);
00038  
00039  
00040  
00041  /*
00042   * Undocumented function. 
00043   */
00044  void regsub(const Regexp *prog, const char *source, char *dest);
00045  
00046  
00047  /*
00048   * Undocumented function.
00049   */
00050  void regerror(const char *s);
00051  
00052  
00053  
00054  /*
00055   * Get value of arguments defined in the regular expression, and the number of arguments.
00056   * @param regexp a regular expression
00057   * @param nb_args a pointer on a unsigned int where the number og arguments will be stored
00058   * @return a char * array. At [0] will be the first argument, [1] the second, etc. or NULL if regular expression defined not argument.
00059   */
00060  char **reggetsub(Regexp *regexp, unsigned int *nb_args);
00061 #endif
